New Records: Yuzvendra Chahal needs five wickets to become the first Indian, and eighth overall, to take 100 T20I wickets.
Key Match Events: India won by 9 wickets (with 18 balls remaining)
Teams batting first have won 11 of the 13 completed T20Is played here.
Pre-Game Insights: India are looking to try out personnel for the 2024 T20 World Cup, with Yashasvi Jaiswal and Tilak Varma in consideration.
Tilak Varma has impressed with his temperament and could fill a void for India in ODIs.
Post-Match Reflections: India's win keeps their series alive and sets them up for future experiments with players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies are rebuilding their T20I side under Rovman Powell.
Shimron Hetmyer and Shubman Gill are key players to watch for West Indies and India respectively.
Others: The pitch in Lauderhill has been favorable for teams batting first, with India winning both matches they batted first in the series.
